cards.name: The Fool
cards.effect_upright:
As a **bonus action**, choose yourself or one ally. That creature gains **advantage** on its next **Deception or Performance check**.
You can use this ability once (twice at 8th level).
After activation, The Fool becomes **Tapped** and then **Vanishes** once all uses are expended.
If The Fool is shuffled back into the deck, this effect is lost and The Fool **Vanishes**.
cards.effect_inverted: You have **advantage** on **initiative rolls**. After everyone has rolled for initiative, you may swap initiatives with one willing ally. Then 'The Fool' card **Vanishes**.
cards.fortune_upright:
You learn the [Seeming](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=seeming) spell.
That spell can cast be without expending a spell slot on yourself or a number of allied creatures equal to your **proficiency bonus**, also creatures have **disadvantage** on **Investigation checks** when trying to discover yours or your ally's disguises.
Then 'The Fool' card **Vanishes**. When 'The Fool' card is shuffled into the deck, the effect expires.
cards.fortune_inverted: When initiative is rolled you can make yourself or one ally instantly roll a 20 on initiative. Then 'The Fool' card **Vanishes**.

cards.name: The Magician
cards.effect_upright:
Upright: Choose a number of spells equal to half your Wisdom modifier rounded up from the [Wizard spell list](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd-filters/spells-5e.php)
 (add The Magician Feat to your class sheet).
The Wizard spells you choose must all be of a level you can cast no higher than 2nd level.
You know those spells, they are Cleric spells for you, and you can cast them using your spell slots. 'The Magician' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.effect_inverted: You gain **expertise** in **Deception checks** for **1 hour**. But you have **disadvantage** on **Intelligence and Wisdom checks**. 'The Magician' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.fortune_upright:
You can spend **10 minutes** to infuse 'The Magician' card with one of your [Cleric spells](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd-filters/spells-5e.php). This spell can be no higher than [5th level](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd-filters/spells-5e.php). You don't expend a spell slot when infusing a spell. 'The Magician' then becomes a **Tapped**.
You can cast the spell contained within the card once without verbal or material components at any time until the next Long rest. When used, 'The Magician' card **Vanishes**.
cards.fortune_inverted: You gain **expertise** in 3 Skills of your choice for **1 hour**. 'The Magician' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**

cards.name: The High Priestess
cards.effect_upright: When you cast one of your prepared [Divination spells](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd-filters/spells-5e.php), you can do so without expending a spell slot and as an **action**. Then 'The High Priestess' card **Vanishes**.
cards.effect_inverted:
As a **reaction** you can force a creature within **60 feet** of you to re-roll a **Wisdom ability Check or Wisdom Saving throw**, the new result must be taken.
(If the creature has a higher Wisdom score than you the card is used and nothing happens). Then 'The High Priestess' card **Vanishes**.
cards.fortune_upright: You can cast the [Scrying](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=scrying) and [Divination](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=divination) spells using your Reader of Fate Feature until the next long rest.  'The High Priestess' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**
cards.fortune_inverted:
You can cast the [Banishment](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=banishment) Spell once without expending a spell slot up to your current spell level. Then 'The High Priestess' card **Vanishes**.
At 13th, Level you can cast the [Plane Shift](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=plane-shift) spell instead of [Banishment](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=banishment)

cards.name: The Empress
cards.effect_upright:
You learn the spell [Speak with Animals](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=speak-with-animals) and [Cure Wounds](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=cure-wounds) 
Also, when you cast a spell that heals yourself or an ally, they gain additional hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier. 'The Empress' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.effect_inverted:
As a **bonus action**, you may choose one of your allies within **60 feet** that can see and hear you.
That ally can use their **reaction** to move up to half their speed without provoking attacks of opportunity, however you cannot take the **action** until **your next turn**.
You can use this ability once. Two times at 8th level. 'The Empress' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**,
cards.fortune_upright:
You learn the spells [Speak With Animals](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=speak-with-animals) and [Speak with Plants](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=speak-with-plants) at will.
You an also cast the Spells [Mass Cure Wounds](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=mass-cure-wounds) without expending a spell slot.
At 13th level you can cast [Mass Cure Wounds](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=mass-cure-wounds) twice. 'The Empress' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.fortune_inverted:
You learn the spell [Speak With Animals](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=speak-with-animals) and [Speak with Plants](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=speak-with-plants) at will.
Also you can cast the spell [Wrath of Nature](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=wrath-of-nature) once without spending a spell slot.
 At 13th level you can also cast the spell [Wall of Thorns](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=wall-of-thorns) once without expending a spell slot.  'The Empress' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.

cards.name: The Emperor
cards.effect_upright: This card allows you to cast the Spell [Command](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=command) once without expending a spell slot. Also you gain **advantage** on **Intimidation checks**. 'The Emperor' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.effect_inverted: For **10 minutes** allies within **10ft** of you have **advantage** on **saving throws** against being **frightened** or **charmed**. 'The Emperor' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.fortune_upright:
This card allows you to cast the [Hold Person](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=hold-person) spell without expending a spell slot up to a spell of 5th level.
At 9th Level, you can also use the [Hold Monster](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=hold-monster) spell instead. Then 'The Emperor' card **vanishes**.
cards.fortune_inverted:
You can use an **action** to activate the following effect:
For **1 hour** you and allies within **30ft** are immune to being **frightened** or **charmed**. 'The Emperor' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.

cards.name: The Hierophant
cards.effect_upright:
As a **bonus action**, you can grant an ally **advantage** on the next **Intelligence check**.
You can use this ability once. Two times at 8th level. Then 'The Hierophant' becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.effect_inverted: You gain **expertise** in **Investigation and History checks** for **1 hour**. Then 'The Hierophant' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.fortune_upright:
As an **action**, you and all Allied Creatures within **10ft** of you have **advantage** on **Intelligence checks** for **1 hour**. 'The Hierophant' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
At 9th level you learn the [Skill Empowerment](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=skill-empowerment) spell, this is treated as a Cleric spell.
cards.fortune_inverted: You lean the spells [Intellect Fortress](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=intellect-fortress) and [Counterspell](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=counterspell). These spells are treated as a Cleric spells. 'The Hierophant' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.

cards.name: The Lovers
cards.effect_upright: You learn the [Warding Bond](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=warding-bond) Spell and can cast it once without expending a spell slot.Then 'The Lovers' becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.effect_inverted: You learn the [Friends](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=friends) Cantrip and gain **expertise** in **Persuasion checks** for **10 minutes**. Then 'The Lovers' becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.fortune_upright:
Once, as an **action**, you may choose an ally within **60 feet** of you.
Whenever either you or that ally regain hit points while within **60 feet** of each other, you both regain the same number of hit points. 'The Lovers' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**
cards.fortune_inverted:
You can cast the spell [Charm Monster](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=charm-monster) once without expending a spell slot.
 Also, you gain **expertise** and **advantage** on **Persuasion checks** for **10 minutes**.  'The Lovers' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.

cards.name: The Chariot
cards.effect_upright:
As **bonus action**, you may increase the **walking speed** of yourself or an allied creature within **60 feet** by 5 feet times your Wisdom Modifier for **10 minutes** and it has three times its carrying capacity.
Then 'The Chariot' becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**. However, once the effect expires that creature is **stunned** and gains one point of **exhaustion**.
cards.effect_inverted:
As **bonus action**, you may grant an allied creature within **60ft** **advantage** on all attacks on their next turn, however they must move as fast as possible towards the nearest enemy and they must attack if able.
Also all enemy creatures gain **advantage** on attacks against that ally until **your next turn**. Then 'The Chariot' card **Vanishes**.
cards.fortune_upright:
This card allows you to use the [Dominate person](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=dominate-person) Spell without expending a spell slot.
At 15th Level, you can also use the spell [Dominate Monster](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=dominate-monster) instead but it consumes a spell slot. Then 'The Chariot' card **vanishes**.
cards.fortune_inverted:
As **bonus action**, you may grant an allied creature within **60ft** resistance to all damage until their next turn, however they must move as fast as possible towards the nearest enemy and they must attack if able,
Also, all enemy creatures gain **advantage** on attacks against that ally until **your next turn**. Then 'The Chariot' card **Vanishes**.

cards.name: Strength
cards.effect_upright: As a **bonus action**, you can grant yourself or an ally **advantage** on **Strength checks** (and if you targeted yourself your Strength score becomes equal to your Wisdom score) for **10 minutes**. Then 'Strength' becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.effect_inverted: As a **reaction**, when a creature within **30 feet** of you makes an attack or a **Charisma check** against a creature other than you, you can force the creature to make a **Wisdom saving throw**. On a failure, they automatically fail that roll. Then 'The Strength' card **Vanishes**.
cards.fortune_upright:
As an **action**, you can target a number of creatures up to your **proficiency bonus** within **60ft**.
Their Strength becomes equal to your Wisdom score. Also they have **advantage** on **Strength checks** and become resistant to bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage for **1 round**. Then the 'Strength' card **vanishes**.
cards.fortune_inverted: As an **action**, you target a number of creatures equal to your **proficiency bonus** within a **60ft** radius of you. They are forced to make a **Wisdom saving throw**. On a failure they become **frightened** of you for **1 minute** and have **disadvantage** on **Charisma checks and saving throws**. Then the 'Strength' card **vanishes**.

cards.name: The Hermit
cards.effect_upright:
As an **action**, you gain **advantage** on **Dexterity and Wisdom saving throws** for **10 minutes**.
You cannot benefit from the Help **action**. Then 'The Hermit' becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.effect_inverted:
As a **bonus action**, you can grant all allies within **60ft** of you **advantage** on their next **Dexterity or Wisdom saving throw**.
However, you gain **disadvantage** on **Dexterity and Wisdom saving throws** for **10 minutes**. 'The Hermit' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.fortune_upright:
As an **action**, you gain **advantage** on **Dexterity and Wisdom ability checks and saving throws** for **10 minutes**.
You also gain **expertise** on **Insight and Perception checks**. You cannot benefit from the Help **action**. 'The Hermit' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.fortune_inverted:
As an **action**, you can grant all allies within **60ft** of you **advantage** on **Dexterity check and saving throws or Wisdom ability checks and saving throws** for **10 minutes**.
However, you gain **disadvantage** on **Dexterity and Wisdom saving throws** for **10 minutes**. Then 'The Hermit' card **Vanishes**.

cards.name: Justice
cards.effect_upright:
You learn the spells [Zone of Truth](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=zone-of-truth) and [Detect Evil and Good](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=detect-evil-and-good) 
If you don't already have them prepared and can cast both spells at will without expending a spell slot.
You also have **advantage** on **Insight checks** against creatures with an Evil Alignment. Then the 'Justice' becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.effect_inverted:
As a **reaction**, when a creature you can see within **60 feet** of you makes an **attack roll, ability check, or saving throw**, you can force the creature to re-roll.
You make this decision after the result is clear and the target must use the second roll. Then the 'Justice' card **Vanishes**.
cards.fortune_upright: You can cast the [Slow](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=slow) spell once without material components or expending a spell slot. Then the 'Justice' card **vanishes**. At 13th Level, you can also use the spell [Force Cage](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=forcecage) instead, but it consumes a spell slot.
cards.fortune_inverted: When an attacker within **60 feet** of you deals damage against a creature other than you, you can use a **reaction** to force the attacker to make a **Wisdom saving throw**. On a failed **saving throw**, the attacker takes force damage equal to the damage it just dealt. You can use this **reaction** a number of times equal to half your **proficiency bonus**. 'Justice' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.

cards.name: The Hanged Man
cards.effect_upright: As a **bonus action**, you may give yourself or an ally within **30 feet** a **flying speed** equal to their **walking speed** for **10 minutes**. Then 'The Hanged Man' card **Vanishes**.
cards.effect_inverted:
As a **bonus action**, you can touch a creature. You can ask the God of Fate one question about that creature's past, present or future that must be answered truthfully.
This ability can be used once. Once used 'The Hanged man' card **Vanishes**.
cards.fortune_upright:
As a **bonus action**, target one creature within **60ft**, they are suspended in a magical state, becoming **invulnerable** for **1 round** and they do not have to take **death saving throws**, but they are unable to move or take **actions**.
If unwilling, they must make a **Wisdom saving throw**. Then 'The Hanged Man' card **vanishes**.
cards.fortune_inverted:
As a **reaction**, swap the places of an ally within **60ft** who is hit by an attack, with another within **60ft**, redirecting the damage to them instead.
Also any damage they take heals the other for double the amount. You can use this **reaction** once (twice at 13th level). 'The Hanged Man' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.

cards.name: Death
cards.effect_upright: After using this card, the next time a creature within **60 feet** dies, you regain one spell slot. The level is equal to the creature's CR or level, up to 4th level. Then 'Death' becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.effect_inverted: You can cast the [Alter Self](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=alter-self) spell once without expending a spell slot. Then the 'Death' card **Vanishes**.
cards.major_upright:
You learn the spell [Finger of Death](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=finger-of-death). Also you can cast the [Power Word Kill](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=power-word-kill) spell once without expending a spell slot.
'Death' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**. You cannot use the 'Major' feature again until **1 week** has passed.
cards.major_inverted: You can cast the [True Polymorph](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=true-polymorph) spell once without expending a spell slot. Then the 'Death' card **vanishes**. You cannot use the 'Major' feature again until **1 week** has passed.

cards.name: The Devil
cards.effect_upright: You gain Gold equal to 1D100 x your Cleric level. However, you gain a crippling addiction for **1 week**. Then 'The Devil' card **Vanishes**.
cards.effect_inverted: You learn the [Misty Step](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=misty-step) spell and can cast it once without expending a spell slot. 'The Devil' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.fortune_upright: This card allows you to cast [Suggestion](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=suggestion) once without expending a spell slot. At 13th Level, you can use [Mass Suggestion](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=mass-suggestion) instead. For **1 hour**, you have **advantage** and double **proficiency bonus** on **Persuasion and Deception checks** with creatures of the opposite alignment. 'The Devil' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.fortune_inverted: This card allows you to cast [Dimension Door](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=dimension-door) once without expending a spell slot. At 13th Level, you can use [Teleport](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=teleport) instead. Also, you cannot be **grappled**, **paralyzed**, or **restrained** for **1 hour**. Then 'The Devil' card **vanishes**.

cards.name: The Tower
cards.effect_upright: You learn [Shatter](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=shatter) and can cast it once (twice at 8th level) without expending a spell slot. Then 'The Tower' becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.effect_inverted: As an **action**, you can reduce your hit point maximum. Then touch a creature to increase theirs by twice that amount. Then 'Tower' card **Vanishes**.
cards.fortune_upright: As a **reaction**, target one enemy within **60ft**. They have **disadvantage** on **Constitution, Intelligence or Wisdom saving throws** and their AC is reduced until the start of **your next turn**. At 13th level, you can use this twice. Then 'The Tower' card **Vanishes**.
cards.fortune_inverted: As a **reaction**, target one ally within **60ft**. They gain **advantage** on **Constitution, Intelligence and Wisdom saving throws** and gain AC until the start of its next turn. At 13th level, you can use this twice. Then 'The Tower' card **Vanishes**.

cards.name: The Star
cards.effect_upright: You gain the Lucky Feat, or 3 additional Luck Points. 'The Star' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.effect_inverted: As an **action**, you can cast [Revivify](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=revivify) once without expending a spell slot and with **advantage**. Then 'The Star' card **Vanishes**.
cards.major_upright: You gain one use of [Wish](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=wish), usable until the next long rest. Then 'The Star' card **vanishes**. Cannot use again for **1 week**.
cards.major_inverted: You can cast [True Resurrection](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=true-resurrection) as an **action** without material components or spell slots. Then 'The Star' card **vanishes**. Cannot use again for **1 week**.

cards.name: The Moon
cards.effect_upright: You learn [Invisibility](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=invisibility) and can cast it at will. Then 'The Moon' becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.effect_inverted: You learn [See Invisibility](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=see-invisibility) and can cast it at will. Then 'The Moon' becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.fortune_upright: You learn [Greater Invisibility](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=greater-invisibility). You can cast [Major Image](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=major-image) once without a slot. At 13th Level you can cast [Mirage Arcane](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=mirage-arcane). 'The Moon' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.fortune_inverted: You learn [See Invisibility](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=see-invisibility) at will. You can cast [Arcane Eye](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=arcane-eye) once without a slot. At 11th Level you can cast [True Seeing](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=true-seeing). 'The Moon' then becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.

cards.name: The Sun
cards.effect_upright: You learn [Healing Word](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=healing-word). At 3rd level you learn [Lesser Restoration](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=lesser-restoration). At 5th level you learn [Mass Healing Word](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=mass-healing-word). Then 'The Sun' becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.effect_inverted: You learn [Burning Hands](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=burning-hands). At 3rd level you learn [Scorching Ray](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=scorching-ray). At 5th level you learn [Fireball](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=fireball). Then 'The Sun' becomes a **Tapped** Card until **Vanished**.
cards.fortune_upright: You learn [Greater Restoration](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=greater-restoration). You can cast [Heal](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=heal) once (twice at 17th level) without a spell slot. Then 'The Sun' card **vanishes**.
cards.fortune_inverted: You learn [Flame Strike](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=flame-strike). You can cast [Sunbeam](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=sunbeam) or [Fire Storm](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=fire-storm) once without a spell slot. Then 'The Sun' card **vanishes**.

cards.name: Judgement
cards.effect_upright: As a **bonus action**, target one creature within **60 feet**. Learn its **immunities**, **resistances**, or **vulnerabilities**. At 14th level, you can grant it **vulnerability** or **immunity** to one damage type. Then 'The Judgement' card **Vanishes**.
cards.effect_inverted: As a **bonus action**, target one creature within **60 feet**. Give it **disadvantage** on one type of **saving throw** until **your next turn**. Then 'The Judgement' card **Vanishes**.
cards.fortune_upright: You can cast [Disintegrate](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=disintegrate) without a spell slot. At 17th level you can cast [Power Word Stun](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=power-word-stun). Then the 'Judgement' card **vanishes**.
cards.fortune_inverted: You can cast [Resurrection](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=resurrection) once without material components and with **advantage**. Then the 'Judgement' card **vanishes**.

cards.name: The World
cards.effect_upright: When used: Draw two more cards. These can exceed your hand size. 'The World' card then **Vanishes**.
cards.effect_inverted: When used: Add one **Vanished** card to your hand. 'The World' card then **Vanishes**.
cards.major_upright: You can cast [Mass Heal](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=mass-heal) once without a spell slot. Cannot use again for **1 week**. 'The World' card then **vanishes**.
cards.major_inverted: You can cast [Meteor Swarm](https://www.aidedd.org/dnd/sorts.php?vo=meteor-swarm) once without a spell slot. Cannot use again for **1 week**. 'The World' card then **vanishes**.
